Question.Subject: Chat Roulette won't let me click on the little agreement box because of Adobe Flash Player?
Question.Content: I tried to go on the chatroulette website, but when I click 'start', there's a little agreement box that asks you to click accept / deny, but it won't let me click either. I downloaded the latest version of Adobe Flash Player, but it didn't do anything. What can I do to make this work? Thanks in advance. OK THANKS, it appears on other websites, too.
Question.ChosenAnswer: it's probably better that way. i tried chatroulette and it's like 90% random penises...not very appealing to me.

Answer.Content: it's probably better that way. i tried chatroulette and it's like 90% random penises...not very appealing to me.
